column1: Auction / Bidding, Auction: Once Around, Closed Economy Auction, Constrained Bidding, Hidden Victory Points, Push Your Luck, Set Collection

Ra is an auction and set-collection game with an Ancient Egyptian theme.  Each turn players are able to purchase lots of tiles with their bidding tiles (suns).  Once a player has used up his or her suns, the other players continue until they do likewise, which may set up a situation with a single uncontested player bidding on tiles before the end of the round occurs.  Tension builds because the round may end before all players have had a chance to win their three lots for the epoch.  The various tiles eithe...
